title: Influence of inorganic nano-fertilizer on the transport and release of nano- and micro-plastics in saturated quartz sand
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3335-3345
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00205A, Paper
Yanan Liu, Jizhe Lu, Genyao Gu, Shenghao Liu, Quanyuan Chen, Yunfei Zhang, Li Cai
Nano-CaCO3 enhanced both the transport and release of nano- and micro-plastics in porous media, accelerating their threat to groundwater.
